advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: This blockbuster runnerkeeps charging ahead with loads of rewards to chase and special events set in cities across the world.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: How far can you roll the ball?

editorialNotes.tagline: Can you build the best base?
editorialNotes.standard: Its hard to understate Clash of Clans massive influence in establishing complex strategic multiplayer on mobilewe still love logging on to find that our meticulously placed and upgraded fortifications survived another onslaught.

Colourful chaos awaits in our 2016 iPhone Game of the Year. Supercells awesome card battler delivers excellent deck-building mechanics and fast-paced fights in a package thats easy to understand and undeniably fun. Upgrading, unlocking and experimenting with cards gives the game endless replayability, and deciding just where to drop your heroes makes each battle distinct. But no matter how good your deck is, theres no substitute for skill and quick thinking.
editorialNotes.short: Collect powerful cards and crush your competition.

editorialNotes.standard: With exciting events, famous characters, and wild courses, Nintendos legendary kart-racing series burns rubber on mobile.
editorialNotes.short: Tour the world and race on tracks in cities around the globe.

editorialNotes.standard: It took less than a minute for us to get hooked on this series all over again. The sequel to Rovios blockbuster puzzler polishes the feathery fun to a golden sheenand with more than just beautiful new graphics. Features like multi-stage levels, pig-punishing spells and choosing the order in which you fling birds make the game more irresistible than ever. Whether its your first Angry Birds game or your 10th, youll be flying high in no time.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: Shoot and take over the bases!

editorialNotes.standard: Adventure across a modern cityscape filled with raids, dungeons, and lots of monsters in this gorgeous action RPG based on the popular webtoon.

ios.subtitle: Play a star in soccer games!
Control Mario with just a tap!

editorialNotes.standard: He's here! We're all about pulling off stylish moves with a single tap, thanks to super-simple, one-touch controls. But collecting all the pink coins? That takes skill. With tons of unlocks (including Luigi!), youll be playing this one long after you reach the final flagpole.
Be the last player standing in this mobile take on the blockbuster battle royale, which goes above and beyond with deep customisability and cutting-edge graphics.

ios.subtitle: Grow the biggest in the game!

editorialNotes.tagline: What goes up, must come down

editorialNotes.standard: Daredevil. Storm. Juggernaut. Vision. Kabams beautiful brawler gives you control of dozens of beloved heroes and villains as you punch, kick and blast your way across the Marvel universe. A simple and intuitive set of attacks, counters and special attacks make for edge-of-your-seat combat, but youll spend just as much time finding and upgrading your super-team. Figuring out the best way to use them is key to surviving bouts with relentless opponentsand progressing through treacherous story quests.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: Run, jump and win the fun race
Get running and join the hype!

name: Tomb of the Mask: Pixel Maze

editorialNotes.standard: Speed is survival in this devilishly fast tomb-raiding arcade game. Like some glorious mix of Indiana Jones and Pac-Man, you race from room to room, nabbing all the coins you can while staying ahead of an ever-moving (and lethal) wall. With its crafty mazes, tricky traps, simple controls, and eye-popping retro minimalism, its an experience youll happily lose yourself in.

ios.subtitle: Play Blox World and Get RBX

editorialNotes.standard: Here comes the wave! In this gorgeous open-world RPG, explore eroded landscapes, battle otherworldly creatures and unlock incredible skills.

ios.subtitle: Race and drive uphill to win!
